input_text:
Job Title: Marketing Coordinator

Location: St Louis Park, MN

Employment Type: full-time

Listed Skills: Marketing, Sales

Description:
Job Summary

RAYUS Radiology, formerly Center for Diagnostic Imaging and Insight Imaging, is looking for a Marketing Coordinator to join our team. We are challenging the status quo by shining light on radiology and making it a critical first step in diagnosis and proper treatment. Come join us and shine brighter together! As our Marketing Coordinator , you will support department workflows by working closely with key stakeholders in ma naging projects and executing various tasks simultaneously . You will ensure marketing efforts are on brand with the company’s vision and mission and assume ownership in ensuring assigned project timelines are defined and deadlines met .  This is a full-time, remote Monday thru Friday working hours; 8:00 AM - 5:00 PM. 

Essential Duties And Responsibilities

Marketing Project Management Support

 Works in conjunction with Marketing Project Managers to execute tasks for a variety of marketing projects in the queue  Monitors and f acilitates the daily creative process of projects for a range of audiences  Provide detailed updated to Marketing Project Managers and other stakeholders  Works with designers and copywriters to create materials, make changes to existing materials, manage collateral and design files  Assists in collecting data and organizing reports and other files for regional and national marketing campaigns  Ma nage ad hoc and recurring internal department projects and upkeeping department documents 

Marketing Front and Back End Production Support

 Works in conjunction with Marketing Traffic Manager on front and back-end production of projects  Ensures team members have the supplies and resources needed to complete projects on time and within budget  Works with production vendors on the upload and auditing of new and revamped material 

Completes other tasks and projects as assigned

Requirements

Required:

 Bachelor’s degre e (or equivalent) in marketing, project management , or related field preferred  2 + years of project coordinator or marketing coordinator or relatable experience  Healthcare/Radiology industry experience a plus  Marketing agency, or in-house corporate marketing team experience a plu s 

RAYUS is committed to delivering clinical excellence in communities across the U.S., driven by our passion for and superior service to referring providers and patients. RAYUS Radiology is built on our brilliant medicine, brilliant team, brilliant technology and services - all to provide the highest level of patient care possible. We bring brilliance to health and wellness. Join our team and shine the light on Radiology Services! RAYUS Radiology is an EO Employer/Vets/Disabled.

Experience Level (if available): Entry level

output_json.title: Marketing Coordinator
